alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:43AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Patchy Freezing Drizzle or Light Freezing Rain Possible This Morning... Spotty light showers or drizzle are expected this morning across much of south central Vermont. With temperatures currently below freezing in many locations, this precipitation may fall as freezing rain or freezing drizzle, with some light ice accumulations possible. This could result in slippery travel conditions, especially on untreated roads. Motorists should use caution and be alert for changing road conditions. Temperatures will gradually warm above freezing this morning, with the threat for icing ending by 10 am in most locations.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
